Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Washington/Wabash
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Washington/Wabash due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Washington/Wabash due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Experiencing Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains will be rerouted to the Outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains will be rerouted to the Outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Clark/Lake, State/Lake, Washington/Wabash, Adams/Wabash, Library/State-Van Buren, LaSalle/Van Buren, Quincy/Wells and Washington/Wells).

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.
